data.name: Princess of Zeven
data.detailed_description:
Latest Release

https://store.steampowered.com/app/1328920/Mira_and_the_Mysteries_of_Alchemy/
https://store.steampowered.com/app/1257170/Saint_Emiliana/
https://store.steampowered.com/app/1328910/Otome_the_Exorcist/
https://store.steampowered.com/app/1405470/Scars_of_Summer/


About the Game

When Princess Leticia's father falls ill from disease, the family is called to decide the next heir to the throne. Following tradition, the heir is decided by a test of worth. Whoever can delve deeper into the "Sea God's Shrine" will be selected as the new ruler.

The successor who has gone the furthest thus far is Leticia's brother, Prince Leon, and she volunteers to abstain from participating. But when her corrupt brother, Prince Tyros, shows up with proof he had bested his eldest brother, Leticia is forced to act.

Now, travelling in disguise, Leticia heads to Zeven, a dangerous port city, where she will face her destiny.

Features:

  • Dungeon crawler RPG
  • In-depth fantasy story
  • Turn-based combat
  • Three difficulty levels
  • Randomly generated dungeons and drops
  • Hundreds of pieces of equipment
  • Element system - Imbue equipment with bonuses
  • Class change system

data.short_description: After the family's succession trial puts Princess Leticia's corrupt brother, Prince Tyros, as the new heir to the throne. Leticia is forced to act. Traveling in disguise, she heads to the dangerous port city of Zeven, to face her destiny.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: WindowsÂ® 7/8/8.1/10
  • Processor: Intel Core2 Duo or better
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: DirectX 9/OpenGL 4.1 capable GPU
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: 1280x768 or better Display. Lag may occur from loading menus or maps. Turn off other programs before running the game.

content_descriptors.notes: Princess of Zeven contains strong language, mature themes, and partial nudity.
